channel.title: 2006Lives || DAILY UPDATES || Must view || Not a 2006scape source
channel.description:
[ul][li]This server currently holds [b]43[/b] players when lagg starts hitting hard.[/li] [li]This server is scheduled to be released on: [b]September 2013[/b][/li][/ul]
[center]No banna sah ;([/center] [center]_________________[/center] [center][b]By:[/b] Angel Carlos[/center] [center]_________________[/center]
[center]__________________________[/center] [center][size=24pt][b]About Me[/b][/size][/center] [center]__________________________[/center]
I am Carlos Parente, and I live in the United States of America. I am 15 years old. I go to school 320 days a year, since my mother wants me to finish highschool in 11th grade. I am I'd say, intelligent, not bright. I don't have IRL issues much, maybe once or twice a year but their nothing big. Coding RSPS I'd say is my hobby, since I sit on my laptop like 10 hours a day and code Rsps, you can say I'm addicted which I'm fine, but the truth I like my ideas and I can't stop thinking of better ideas to code, and I'd like to learn how to code better. I am a Server Sided Coder, not a Client Coder. I am rather an idiot on client sided, I can do some of the hard things but the easy little ones, I'm like a 7 year old.
[center]__________________________[/center] [center][size=24pt][b]Information[/b][/size][/center] [center]__________________________[/center]
Ok to start off if you're not going to read this whole thread then I highly suggest this server development log isn't for you. Now, this is a server I will always code and will not let it shutdown. I previously hosted my other server [b]AncianoX 2[/b] but it didn't go well since their was a lot of children who wanted partyhats and whined the exp rate: 30x was very slow. So then I decided I was going to switch back to my oldschool 474 server since it was well coded, but I couldn't host it. The reason being why I couldn't host the server was that, 10 hours a day on weekdays daily, and 12 hours on weekends isn't enough to satisfy me. I wanted to give the players more time but I can't host the server 24/7 because I have online school, work, and home things to deal with. I never shutdown [b]AncianoX 2[/b] as it is still up but only 4 hours a day. [b]I AM PLANNING ON HAVING THIS SERVER UP FOR MANY YEARS! THIS IS AND WILL ALWAYS BE A LEGIT PROJECT![/b] Now to the main point some people have been waiting. This is After 2006Lives, a oldschool 317 gameframe, maps, objects, characters, etc. I been and will always code this server daily. I never really have irl issues that will stop me, since I played Runescape like 12 hours a day everyday. So you can trust me in updating this thread daily (if not it means i'm coding, since I wanted to make this thread like 2 weeks ago, but I like coding...) and being on the server helping out others. :) This will have all 317 items, everything I have said above. Then after couple months of release I will decide if not I should turn it to a 317 regular 2006 server :P.
[center]__________________________[/center] [center][size=24pt][b]Development Info[/b][/size][/center] [center]__________________________[/center]
[b]Please note:[/b]
This is a serious project, I am planning on having this server up for years to come, when I turn 18, then I will host the server by myself. SO PLEASE I BEG YOU NO BACKSTABBERS!
[ul][li] You will need to be on at least daily and actually reply fast, since I tend to reply very quickly.[/li] [li]You need to be at least [b]13[/b] years old. * This subject yet to change.*[/li] [li]You must use your [b]email[/b] daily! *check on it*[/li] [li]You must have more than [b]3[/b] months of experience! * This subject yet to change.*[/li] [li]You must not have lots of irl issues * sorry for this but, if you were in a job, and I was your boss, you'd get the point.*[/li][/ul]
[quote="Client Developer"]1) Name 2) Age 3) How long have you been coding? 4) How did you learn? 5) From a scale of [b]1-10[/b] what would you rate yourself? *1 being an idiot 10 being Einstein.* 6) Email? 7) Skype? *I don't have it on my laptop, but on my other I do* 8) Any previous releases/servers you were a client dev on? 9) Any previous recommendations? *Kind of like a needed resume* 10) Sorry for this being to long, is it cool or it bothers you to many 9 questions?*optional*[/quote]
[b]Please note: RULES APPLY![/b] I really need to trust you, like others trust others on their server. I really want 2 hosters at the least. Incase 1 goes wrong. But only I can host around 10 hours a day, 12 on weekends. So please no backstabbers, because this is a serious project I plan on coding for years to come, like Soulsplit!
[quote="Hoster"]1) Name 2) Age 3) How long have you been hosting servers or first time? 4) Why do you want to host? 5) From a scale of [b]1-10[/b] how long can you host? *1 being 2 hours 10 being 24/7.* *I really need someone 24/7* 6) Email? 7) Skype? *I don't have it on my laptop, but on my other I do* 8) Any previous servers you hosted? 9) Any previous recommendations? *Kind of like a needed resume* 10) Sorry for this being to long, is it cool or it bothers you to many 9 questions?*optional*[/quote]
[quote="Server Developer"]Not needed currently.[/quote]
[center]__________________________[/center] [center][size=24pt][b]Media![/b][/size][/center] [center]__________________________[/center] [img]http://i.imgur.com/ZWckY.png[/img] *Note this is Galkon's Client.* [img]http://i.imgur.com/DIbz6U0.jpg[/img]
[center]__________________________[/center] [center][size=24pt][b]What has been done![/b][/size][/center] [center]__________________________[/center] [b]July 4 2013[/b] Family reunuion. did not work.
[b]July 5 2013[/b] did not work.
[b]July 6 2013[/b]
[ul][li]Did a little quick review on 2006scape source, just to get some ideas, since it is written really well. Downloaded some sprites and raws for client Was able to change the 474 gameframe to a 317 after couple hours. ;o Degraded 474 objects,maps, etc.. to all 317. Made the char from 562 to 317. Was able to write a event system, with a tutorial help. Wrote down some ideas for what I should do, and thought very well if I should make this a 2006 remake later on. Got some ideas on how to change this server to be a eco/spawn.[/li][/ul]
[b]successfully deleted the server/cache/client files, on accident...! :)[/b]
[b]July 7 2013[/b]
[ul][li]Re downloaded the server files from a previous save after I finished adding the client sided codes.[/li] [li]Updated, cleaned, changed Server name[/li] [li]Started on a similar core and complex like a Matrix.[/li] [li]Started writing some ideas on my notebook.[/li] [li]Looked at some [b]Moparscape Tuts[/b] on how a ::item works.[/li] [li]spent 2 hours adding a better dialogue[/li][/ul]
[b]July 8 2013[/b]
[ul][li]Continued on improving/ changing the dialoguehandler :)[/li] [li] Started reviewing, writing down my plans for this pk server.[/li] [li]Started deleting unwanted useless stuff.[/li] [li]Going to look at every file, and its structure.[/li] [li]Started organizing the server files, better packaging.[/li] [li]Testing if the dialogues, better cnpcclicking could be a issue.[/li] [li][b]Helped others ;p[/b][/li][/ul]

item.title: 2006Lives || DAILY UPDATES || Must view || Not a 2006scape source
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“Angel Carlos, post:19, topic:523837”]feedbacks thanks

oh and no i string the server name everytime i am going to type 2006scape[/quote]
Just because you store text in a string doesn’t mean Jagex are retards. Changing a name doesn’t get them away, when they shut you down you’ll have to sign a binding legal agreement to leave RSPS and RuneScape, never to exploit or reverse engineer their client and protocol again. If you were to go back you’d receive a ridiculous court case and a huge sum of money to pay them.

RSPS isn’t worth getting involved in. Especially not when you’re using a terrible example for a server as the name.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Teem_Rocket wrote:

I’ve seen that screen capture somewhere before. Also, you don’t need to put things like, “My Uncle died today. Decided not to do any updates” into a Development Log. I disagree with a lot of the thread as well. Nevertheless I wish you luck.

P.S. Changing strings of text won’t keep Jagex away.

Read full topic
